title: Question about Worlds Icons & Emotes Bundle

embed.description: Ashe is among the select few champions who are as iconic in esports as they are in solo queue. This year, she'll be donning the Championship armor for Worlds. As in the past, 25% of all Championship Ashe revenue goes straight to the Worlds prize pool.

body:
"As an added bonus, when you equip a team icon during Worlds, their tag will be added to your summoner's name in-game." 

Is this temporary or permanent? I would love it if I can play league and display my favorite team's tag next to my name forever. I would like to know the answer to this question before I purchase a team icon and emote bundle.

replies.body:
Hey, so I already own the "Kaos Latin Gamers" icon and I saw that I can buy the icon and the emote bundle for 450 RP and I'm wondering if I already own the icon why do I have to pay full price (of 450 RP) for the so called bundle and icon since I already own the icon?(bought it for 250 RP a week or so ago)
Shouldn't I get some discount or something because in every bundle I bought so far the more champs/skins you own that the Bundle contains the less it costs?
It's 450 RP because Riot is offering you the icon that includes the emote. The emote is permanent. The icon you bought doesn't include the emote.

So those are 2 different icons, I mean "different" , it's the same team but 1 I've got has no emote included so, if I was to buy the 1 with the emote I'd get another icon, makse sense now.
Thanks bro!
This is a temporary change similar to the event emotes we've had in the past. Those tags should only stick around while World's is going on!
